languages.text:
"Судьба Изгоя — путь терять впотьмах,
Чтобы искать его наощупь снова.
Кровавый след на улицах лихих
Ведет ее меж болью и упадком".

traits.locale_text:
"Судьба Изгоя — путь терять впотьмах,
Чтобы искать его наощупь снова.
Кровавый след на улицах лихих
Ведет ее меж болью и упадком".

languages.text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."
languages.original_text:
"Судьба Изгоя — путь терять впотьмах,
Чтобы искать его наощупь снова.
Кровавый след на улицах лихих
Ведет ее меж болью и упадком".

"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.

That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

languages.text:
“失而复得的道途，
这便是流浪者的前路。
她在肮脏的街道上留下了血腥的脚步，
带领她穿过邪恶与痛苦。”
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

traits.locale_text:
“失而复得的道途，
这便是流浪者的前路。
她在肮脏的街道上留下了血腥的脚步，
带领她穿过邪恶与痛苦。”

languages.text:
«Perder la Senda y en el vacío, a ciegas,
redescubrirla es el destino de la proscrita.
Por caminos mortíferos la sangre siega
para continuar su viaje de dolor y artería».
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

traits.locale_text:
«Perder la Senda y en el vacío, a ciegas,
redescubrirla es el destino de la proscrita.
Por caminos mortíferos la sangre siega
para continuar su viaje de dolor y artería».

languages.text:
「道を失ったのなら、再び触れて探せばい
探求こそが追放者の宿命。
血塗られた道を歩きながら
彼女は苦痛と邪悪の中を進みゆく」
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

traits.locale_text:
「道を失ったのなら、再び触れて探せばい
探求こそが追放者の宿命。
血塗られた道を歩きながら
彼女は苦痛と邪悪の中を進みゆく」

languages.text:
"Den Pfad verlier'n und wiederzufinden,
ja das ist der Ausgestoßenen Los.
Gefährlichen, blutigen Weg sie geht,
Der durch den Schmerz und das Böse sie führt."
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

traits.locale_text:
"Den Pfad verlier'n und wiederzufinden,
ja das ist der Ausgestoßenen Los.
Gefährlichen, blutigen Weg sie geht,
Der durch den Schmerz und das Böse sie führt."

languages.text:
« Perdre la voie puis, en tâtonnant,
La trouver à nouveau, tel est le sort des Errants.
Dans des rues dangereuses, elle suit une piste ensanglantée
Qui lui fait traverser la souffrance et la cruauté. »
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
Discover it — such is the Outcast's lot.
On parlous streets she treads a bloody trail
That leads her on through pain and wickedness."

languages.text:
"Yolunu kaybetmek ve onu tekrar hissetmek
Budur Yurtsuz'un yazgısı, keşfedilmesi gerek.
Kanlı bir izin peşine düştüğü tehlikeli sokaklarda
Çıkacak yolu en nihayetinde acı ve günahkârlığa."
languages.original_text:
"To lose the Path, and then by touch again
